changes_1.pre: For this project we are looking for new settlements. Compare the upper (before) and lower (after) image and swipe right to indicate that new settlements have been built.
changes_1.post_correct: Yes, that looks like a new settlement being developed, as also suggested by new roads visible in the more recent image. Swipe left to continue the tutorial.
changes_1.post_wrong: Oh no. Make sure to spot all the new settlements and swipe right. New roads can also function as an indicator sometimes.

changes_2.pre: And again: If new settlements have been built, swipe to the right side.
changes_2.post_correct: Correct. We can spot new settlements in the upper right part of the satellite image. Swipe left to go on with some more examples.
changes_2.post_wrong: Take a closer look. There new settlements here in the upper right part of the satellite image.

no_changes_1.pre: In this example, no settlements emerged. Swipe left to indicate no changes.
no_changes_1.post_correct: Nice. Just watch out for changes referring to settlements. Swipe left to continue.
no_changes_1.post_wrong: Oh no. Not all changes refer to new settlements, some are just related to vegetation.

no_changes_2.pre: We can spot changes in the vegetation for this imagery pair, but no changes related to settlements. Again, swipe left.
no_changes_2.post_correct: Cool. You got it. Just look out for changes concerning settlements.
no_changes_2.post_wrong: Sorry, try again. Don't be distracted by changes in vegetation, just look out for settlements.

maybe_1.pre: Sometimes it might be unclear if settlements emerged. Swipe down if you are not sure.
maybe_1.post_correct: Great. We cannot really tell if the bright spot in the middle is a new settlement. This is a 'maybe'.
maybe_1.post_wrong: Are you really sure? Sometimes it's better to mark the imagery as 'not sure'.

bad_imagery_1.pre: Swipe up to indicate if there is no imagery or if there are clouds.
bad_imagery_1.post_correct: That's right, that image was way too cloudy to make a good assessment! You managed to pass through this tutorial, now it's time for some real mapping.
bad_imagery_1.post_wrong: It there is no imagery or clouds, we cannot tell the right answer. Make sure to mark this as well by swiping up.
